TopicTitle: Kerbal Powers Tier and Challenge Chart

Articles.Content:
This is a chart of the different Tiers and challenges to obtain those Tiers in the Kerbal Powers Board Game. Also links to each seasonal or special challenge will be posted here.

Tier 0 to Tier1

  • Design and build a Basic Manufacturing Center. Take two screenshots and post them on the thread bellow. Reward 25 Kerbitz, Bonus prize for first place will gain an additional 25 Kerbitz

  • Design and build a Light Ground Vehicle. Note that this vehicle does not have to be a military craft. Take two screenshots and post them on the thread bellow, write a very brief description of the craft's function. If the vehicle is military please PM the craft file to Camulus777. Reward 25 Kerbitz, Bonus prize for first place will gain an additional 15 Kerbitz.

  • Design and build a Basic Airfield. Take two screenshots and post them on the thread bellow. Reward 25 Kerbitz, Bonus prize for first place will gain an additional 25 Kerbitz

  • Design and build a Light Air Vehicle. Note that this vehicle does not have to be a military craft. Take two screenshots and post them on the thread bellow, write a very brief description of the craft's function. If the vehicle is military please PM the craft file to Camulus777. Reward 25 Kerbitz, Bonus prize for first place will gain an additional 25 Kerbitz.

  • Design and build a Basic Manufacturing Center. Take two screenshots and post them on the thread bellow. Reward 25 Kerbitz, Bonus prize for first place will gain an additional 25 Kerbitz

  • Design and build a Light Naval Vehicle. Note that this vehicle does not have to be a military craft. Take two screenshots and post them on the thread bellow, write a very brief description of the craft's function. If the vehicle is military please PM the craft file to Camulus777. Reward 25 Kerbitz, Bonus prize for first place will gain an additional 25 Kerbitz.

Edited November 9, 2013 by camulus777
For whatever else i come up with.
Nice, Didn't think these would show up

For Saturday's opening design and build a drag racer 50 parts max 10 tons and fits one Kerbal. The fastest most stable vehicle will win an extra 25 Kerbitz. Show pics of your craft here on the thread along with a persist file by Monday 10pm PMT. We will determine the fastest speed as the best speed at the end of the runway.

Edited November 9, 2013 by camulus777
edit for update.

are we allowed to use rockets or does it have to be under its own power?

Also, dont we have to build a manufacturing center first? Man, this is quite confusing.... I wasnt expecting it to be so overly complicated...

Edited November 9, 2013 by Highlad

No you don't when it comes to challenges think of it as separate. So no Manufacturing center and use whatever you want. I just can't leave the ground and has to make it to the end of the runway to be counted. when your craft reaches the end of the runway that is when you count its speed. So make sure it has enough fuel.

I'm trying to make it as simple as possible But i am working with text. when everyone gets on I'll explain. Most of it is also to prevent a Zekez Black alliance from destroying the world through monopoly .

This is my entry (for now) it gets up to about 260m/s by the end of the runway

http://www./download/hy2n86e0qvddt59/Dragracer_(Ferrean).craft

The second challenge for Kerbal Powers will be to design a Strike Jet, and a coastal missile boat and use both to hit a target as a test. Show Screen Shots of both launches and missile firing and missile strikes if you can manage it. I would recommend if you can show a video and that will cover everything but pics will be fine if you don't feel like it.
